<color=orange>Open the gift </color> to see who is there!
See the pond below? \n\n<color=orange>Drag the cat</color> over there to start fishing
Now wait a bit while cat catches all fish from pond...
Let's <color=orange>buy another cat</color>!\n\nP.S. you can get more species of animals later
Merge animals of the same level to get a stronger one\n\n<color=orange>Drag one cat to another</color>

But it gives you a smaller reward
<color=orange>Place a cat</color> to fish in big pond
You can place only <color=orange>1</color> cat in the fishing hut for now
<color=orange>Collect the reward</color>\n\nСat can't fish again until you do it
